metadata.subject: iMessage conversation between jee and Terje

relationships.description: Very close to the President, influential player in Washington
Working very closely with Orban and European colleagues
Having dinner together in Paris, arranging meetings

analysis.purpose: Coordinate meetings between political figures and share travel plans
analysis.significance: Shows back-channel political coordination involving Steve Bannon, European leaders, and references to Trump-Putin meeting arrangements

notable_quotes: Kurtz important. As he will host trump and Putin
Steve Bannon, who behind the scenes still is one of the most insightful and influential players in Washington (and very close to the President)
He is now working very closely with Victor Orban and other of your colleagues in Europe
red_flags: High-level political coordination through informal channels

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

public_knowledge.context: Discussions about Trump-Putin meetings and Steve Bannon's political activities would be of high media interest given the political context of 2018

analysis.summary: This iMessage conversation shows political coordination between Terje and jee regarding arranging meetings with Steve Bannon, who is described as influential in Washington and working with European leaders like Victor Orban. The chat references Kurtz hosting Trump and Putin, and includes travel coordination between Paris, Vienna, and London.
